title: Lynda - Learn Lightroom Mobile: The Basics
description:
Lynda - Learn Lightroom Mobile: The Basics

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

1h 45m Intermediate Jan 22, 2016   | Uploaded in Feb 4, 2016 by 2boweb

Subject: Photography 
Software: Lightroom Lightroom Mobile 
Author: Chris Orwig 

Get up to speed with Adobe's Lightroom mobile app, which takes Lightroom's most powerful featuresâ€”the catalog and powerful Develop moduleâ€”and streamlines them for use on a smartphone or tablet. With Lightroom for mobile, you can sync photo collections effortlessly across devices (including your desktop), make over 40 one-click adjustments, or dive deep into the more fine-tuned editing controls. This overview is a fun exploration of the creative possibilities offered by the app. Chris Orwig, a teacher and professional photographer, shows how to view and rate images, select the "keepers," crop photos and fine-tune color, change looks quickly with adjustment presets, share your photos online, and combine Lightroom for mobile with other photo editing apps such as Adobe Fix and Mix. 
Topics include:
	â€¢	Importing photos in the Lightroom mobile app
	â€¢	Synchronizing collections in Lightroom for desktop
	â€¢	Rating and organizing photos with flags and stars
	â€¢	Making photo adjustments
	â€¢	Cropping photos
	â€¢	Applying presets
	â€¢	Fine-tuning color
	â€¢	Applying a vignette
	â€¢	Sharing photos from Lightroom for mobile
	â€¢	Retouching with Adobe Fix
	â€¢	Combining photos with Adobe Mix
	â€¢	Editing photos offline
	â€¢	Working with gestures
